[[VK_EXT_conservative_rasterization]]
=== VK_EXT_conservative_rasterization

*Name String*::
    `VK_EXT_conservative_rasterization`
*Extension Type*::
    Device extension
*Registered Extension Number*::
    102
*Revision*::
    1

  * Requires `<<VK_KHR_get_physical_device_properties2>>`
